entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who did not get the prefect badge and is worried about being teased by his friends.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone Ron had asked for a prefect badge, but it was not granted.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as Ron's best friend and the one who beat Ron at something.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as someone who said Harry has caused too much trouble.

relationships.description: Ron asked Dumbledore for a prefect badge, but it was not granted.
Harry beat Ron at something, which made Ron happy and proud of himself.
Fred said that Harry has caused too much trouble.
